alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 05 at 3:31PM EDT until July 07 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT THURSDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island), Kings (Brooklyn) and Southern Queens Counties. * WHEN...For the first Coastal Flood Statement, from 9 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Thursday. For the second Coastal Flood Statement, from Thursday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An additional round of brief minor flooding is possible with the evening high tide cycle Friday.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
